prompt: Create a minimalistic login form interface with a monochrome gray theme. The UI should feature a centered single-column layout with a light gray background (Colors.grey[100]). At the top, display a 'Sign In' heading in a bold, 30px font with a dark gray color (Colors.grey[800]). Below, include a subtitle 'Enter your details' in a 14px font with a medium gray color (Colors.grey[600]). Add two input fields: an email TextField with a sharp rectangular border (BorderRadius.zero), a gray border (Colors.grey[400]), an email icon prefix (Icons.email), a 'Email' label, and a hint text 'Your email'. The password TextField should have matching styling with a lock icon prefix (Icons.lock), a 'Password' label, a hint text 'Your password', and a visibility toggle. Both fields should use a dark gray focused border (Colors.grey[800]). Include a 'Forgot Password?' link aligned to the right in dark gray (Colors.grey[800]) with a 14px font. Add a full-width elevated button for login with a dark gray background (Colors.grey[800]), white text, and sharp corners (BorderRadius.zero). At the bottom, include a row with 'Need an account?' text in medium gray followed by a 'Sign Up' link in dark gray. Use 20 pixels padding around the main content and 10 pixels spacing between elements. The form container should have a white background with a subtle gray shadow (BoxShadow: color Colors.grey[300], blurRadius 8). Ensure the layout is responsive with scrolling support.
